type.name: ascii
type.description: map as many characters to the closest ASCII character as possible

type.name: accents
type.description: map base + punctuation, etc to accented characters

type.name: publish
type.description: map to preferred forms for publishing, such as “, ”, —

type.name: casefold
type.description: apply Unicode case folding

type.name: lower
type.description: apply Unicode full lowercase mapping

type.name: upper
type.description: apply Unicode full uppercase mapping

type.name: title
type.description: apply Unicode full titlecase mapping

type.name: digit
type.description: convert to digit form of accent

type.name: fwidth
type.description: map characters to their fullwidth equivalents

type.name: hwidth
type.description: map characters to their halfwidth equivalents

type.name: hex
type.description: map characters to a hex equivalents, eg 'a' to '\u0061'; for hex variants see transform.xml

type.name: nfc
type.description: map string to the Unicode NFC format

type.name: nfd
type.description: map string to the Unicode NFD format

type.name: nfkc
type.description: map string to the Unicode NFKC format

type.name: nfkd
type.description: map string to the Unicode NFKD format

type.name: fcd
type.description: map string to the FCD format; http://unicode.org/notes/tn5

type.name: fcc
type.description: map string to the FCC format; http://unicode.org/notes/tn5

type.name: charname
type.description: map each character to its Unicode name

type.name: npinyin
type.description: map pinyin written with tones to the numeric form

type.name: null
type.description: make no change in the string

type.name: remove
type.description: remove every character in the string

type.name: zawgyi
type.description: map Unicode to Zawgyi Myanmar encoding

type.name: morse
type.description: map Unicode to Morse Code encoding

type.name: accents
type.description: accented characters to map base + punctuation, etc

type.name: ascii
type.description: map from ASCII to the target, perhaps using different conventions

type.name: publish
type.description: map publishing characters, such as “, ”, —, to from vanilla characters

type.name: hex
type.description: map characters from hex equivalents, trying all variants, eg 'U+0061' to 'a'; for hex variants see transform.xml

type.name: npinyin
type.description: map the numeric form of pinyin to the tone format

type.name: zawgyi
type.description: map Zawgyi Myanmar encoding to Unicode

type.name: morse
type.description: map Morse Code to Unicode encoding
